about_the_game:
Hentai EroCum is a relaxing puzzle game.
With 6 different themes, 36 sexy girls and more then 80 beautiful and erotic images.
Enjoy charming girls pictures and relaxing music.
Complete a puzzle and then shake a photo to open much more explicit content.

Gameplay

Swap puzzle pieces to complete levels and then shake a photo to open much more explicit content.
Unlock more locations, situations and beautiful girls. Watch the full pictures after completing the puzzle.

Features

- Sexy girls pictures & Relaxing music

- Solve and shake system
- Gallery mode after completing a level
- Achievements are letters of the English alphabet and numbers - collect the word you want!
- "Enter" key to quickly complete the current level
- The price is only a dollar

content_descriptors.notes:
Puzzle image contains nudity and sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.10+
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Hentai EroCum is a relaxing puzzle game. Enjoy 6 different themes, 36 sexy girls and over 80 beautiful and erotic images. Complete the puzzle and then shake the pictures to reveal more explicit content.
